entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Tampil Lebih Berbeda Dengan Spesifikasi Fantastis
entry.summary: Seperti diketahui bersama Samsung adalah salah satu vendor ponsel yang paling sering mengeluarkan produk baru, kali ini untuk menjawab tantangan dari para konsumsen yang ingin agar ponselnya lebih pintar dan lebih tipis, maka Samsung menjawabnya di ajang World Mobile Congress di Barcelona. Produk teranyar…
entry.content:
Seperti diketahui bersama Samsung adalah salah satu vendor ponsel yang paling sering mengeluarkan produk baru, kali ini untuk menjawab tantangan dari para konsumsen yang ingin agar ponselnya lebih pintar dan lebih tipis, maka Samsung menjawabnya di ajang World Mobile Congress di Barcelona. Produk teranyar keluaran Samsung ini diberi nama Samsung Galaxy S6, ponsel ini diciptakan berbeda dengan desain dan fitur-fitur yang pernah ada.

Pastinya ini akan menjadi ponsel yang paling diminati oleh para pengguna ponsel yang ada di Indonesia, namun apapun kelebihan yang diberikan oleh perusahaan asal negeri ginseng ini, tetap saja memiliki beberapa kekurangan. Salah satunya adalah harganya yang cukup mahal, dan hanya dapat dimiliki oleh kalangan eksekutif. Walaupun memang harga tersebut berasal dari fitur-fitur mewah yang ada di dalam ponsel pintar ini. 

Spesifikasi

Bahasan berikutnya yang pastinya ditunggu oleh para penggemar ponsel pintar adalah spesifikasi dari ponsel Samsung Galaxy S6, berikut ini akan dijabarkan secara gamblang tentang spesifikasi dari ponsel teranyar keluaran Samsung ini :

1. Desain body

Dilihat dari desain luar dari ponsel ini tentunya sudah menunjukkan bahwa ponsel ini untuk kalangan eksekutif. Bagaimana tidak, dilihat dari desain body, ponsel ini dibuat sangat tipis, sekitar 6,8 mm. Bahan dari body juga dibaut lebih kuat, yaitu dari bahan metal, dengan total dimensi 143.4 x 70,5 x 6.8 mm, sedangkan berat dari ponsel ini hanya 138 g.

2. Desain layar

Masuk ke desain layar tentunya tidak kalah menarik, hal pertama yang akan Anda dapatkan dari layar Samsung yang berukuran 5 inch ini adalah bagian panel kaca dilengkapi dengan gorilla glass 4 pada bagian depan dan belakang, tentunya ini akan membuat ponsel ini benar-benar anti gores, pada bagian depan gorilla Glass mempunyai kekuatan anti gores dan anti pecah, sedangkan jika digunakan di bagian belakang akan membaut penampilan terlihat lebih mengkilap dan juga premium.

Layar ponsel ini menggunakan teknologi super amoled yang terbaru, ditambah dengan resolusi sebesar 1440 x 2560 pixles, tingkat kerapatan warna hingga -577 ppi, ini juga yang membuat layar menjadi lebih tajam, warna gambar akan tempil secara sempurna, sehingga Anda tidak akan dapat melihat titik pixel dalam ponsel tersebut. Yang menarik adalah ponsel ini masih tetap mempertahankan fitur finger print, karena fitur ini tentunya sangat dibutuhkan oleh para penggunak ponsel terutama untuk masalah verifikasi pembayaran, salah satunya menggunakan paypal. Finger print ini digunakan untuk meningkatkan keamanan para pengguna ponsel.

3. Dapur pacu

Anda tidak perlu ragu lagi, jika ponsel ini cukup mahal, maka dapur pacu dari ponsel ini pasti jaminannya. Lihat saja penggunaan Chipset 14nm Exynos 7420 sengaja dibuat oleh perusahaan ini untuk dapat membuat kecepatan tinggi seperti pada prosessor Quad-core 1,5 GHz Cortex-A53 dan juga Quad Core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57, dengan kecepatan 64 bit, pastinya akan membuat ponsel ini dapat bekerja secara cepat dan efisien. Berdasarkan rumor yang beredar, Samsung Exynos 7420 ini adalah prosesor tercepat saat ini, apalagi jika ditambah dengan RAM 3 GB dan juga GPU Mali T760 pastinya membuat performa ponsel ini berada di atas rata-rata.

4. Sistem Operasi

Untuk system operasi ponsel ini menggunakan OS teranyar yaitu Lolipop 5.02 ditambah dengan user intercafe TouchWiz UI. Namun yang menjadi masalah saat ini adalah penampilan menu yang ada pada ponsel ini dianggap kurang menarik, Anda dapat mengakali hal ini dengan menggunakan launcer Andorid yang ada di aplikasi play store.

5. Fitur pembayaran

Untuk aplikasi pembayaran ponsel ini menggunakan fitur Samsung pay. Dimana metode yang digunakan menggunakan sensor NFC yang sertifikatnya diakui oleh Mastercard dan Visa. Fitur seperti ini biasanya sulit diaplikasikan di Indonesia, oleh karena itu fitur ini biasanya hanya ada di beberapa negara seperti Korea Selatan, Amerika, dan negara-negara di Eropa.

6. Konektifitas

Masalah konektifitas Samsung Galaxy S6, ini menggunakan jaringan LTE cat 6 yang mempunyai kecepatan 300 mbps. Ponsel ini menggunakan 1 buah sim card yang berbentuk nano, para pengguna dapat memasukkan nano sim card ini pada bagian bazel samping. Ada juga fasilitas pendukung seperti Bluetooth V4.1 , infrared, dll.

Untuk konektifitas wireless, menggunakan Wei-fi 802.11, dual band, sehingga pengguna dapat menggunakan wi-fi direct dan Wifi hotspot. Ada juga micro USB v2.0 dengan fasilitas MHL 3 TV-out dan juga USB-OTG, selain itu ada juga GPS dengan teknologi A-GPS, Glonass dan juga beidu, sehingga Anda dapat mencari suatu tempat dengan lebih cepat.

7. Kamera

Anda pasti akan suka fasilitas ini, untuk kamera depan menggunakan 5 Megapixel, sedangkan untuk kamera belakang menggunakan 16 Megapixels. Kamera ini dilengkapi dengan teknologi OIS, autofocus, Apeture f/1.9 dan LED Flash. Dengan demikian Anda dapat memotret suatu moment stabil tanpa perlu takut hasil blur. Kemampuan lain dari kamera ini adalah dapat merekam video dengan Ultra HD 4K yang menggunakan resolusi 2160p@30fps dan didukung oleh mode rekaman HDR, dual video recording.

8. Baterai

Desain baterail ponsel ini memang tidak dapat dicopot, namun dengan adanya aplikasi fast carging pastinya membuat baterai 2550 mah Anda akan dapat terisi dengan cepat.

Kelebihan

Dengan demikian Anda tentunya dapat mengambil kesimpulan bahwa ada beberapa kelebihan yang ada pada ponsel keluaran teranyar dari Samsung ini seperti :

  1. Desain body lebih tipis, hanya berukuran 6,8 mm denagn demikian Anda dapat menggunakan ponsel ini dengan sangat ringkas.
  2. Body metal, dengan menggunakan body dari bahan metal, membuat Anda tidak perlu khawatir body akan mudah rusak.
  3. Menggunakan gorilla glass 4, disematkan pada bagian depan dan belakang ponsel, membuat ponsel ini tahan gores dan tidak akan mudah pecah.
  4. Camera super canggih, Anda yang gemar menangkap moment berharga pastinya akan menyukai ponsel dengan ukuran 16 Megapixels.
  5. Prosesor Samsung Exynos 7420, adalah prosesor tercanggih saat ini, pastinya ini akan membuat dapur pacu semakin baik.
  6. Fast carging, pastinya membuat baterai Anda cepat terisi.

Kekurangan

Adapun kekurangan dari ponsel pintar ini adalah :

  1. Tidak ada micro SD, pastinya ini amat disesalkan namun dengan memori internal 32, 64 dan 128 MB, pastinya ini sudah cukup mengobati para pecinta ponsel Samsung.
  2. Baterai tidak dapat dicabut, ini mungkin sedikit sulit, terutama jika ponsel mengalami error atau lag, untuk mengatasinya Anda dapat mematikan ponsel ini sementara waktu dan menghidupkannya kembali.
  3. Tidak water resistant, tentunya anda dapat mengatasinya dengan menjaga agar ponsel ini tidak terkena air.
  4. Harga yang cukup mahal, hal ini dinilai wajar, karena berbagai macam fitur hebat yang ada pada ponsel teranyar dari Samsung, yaitu; Samsung Galaxy S6.

entry.title: Terms of Service
entry.summary: If you require any more information or have any questions about our Terms of Service, please feel free to contact us by email at Term Of Service.  Introduction These terms and conditions govern your use of this website; by using this website, you accept…
entry.content:
If you require any more information or have any questions about our Terms of Service, please feel free to contact us by email at Term Of Service. 

Introduction

These terms and conditions govern your use of this website; by using this website, you accept these terms and conditions in full and without reservation. If you disagree with these terms and conditions or any part of these terms and conditions, you must not use this website.

You must be at least 18 [eighteen] years of age to use this website. By using this website and by agreeing to these terms and conditions, you warrant and represent that you are at least 18 years of age.

License to use website

Unless otherwise stated, https://harinarmadi.id and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights published on this website and materials used on https://harinarmadi.id. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved.

You may view, download for caching purposes only, and print pages, files or other content from the website for your own personal use, subject to the restrictions set out below and elsewhere in these terms and conditions.

You must not:

Where content is specifically made available for redistribution, it may only be redistributed within your organisation.

Acceptable use

You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of https://harinarmadi.id or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful purpose or activity.

You must not use this website to copy, store, host, transmit, send, use, publish or distribute any material which consists of (or is linked to) any spyware, computer virus, Trojan horse, worm, keystroke logger, rootkit or other malicious computer software.

You must not conduct any systematic or automated data collection activities on or in relation to this website without https://neocities.org's express written consent.

This includes:

You must not use this website or any part of it to transmit or send unsolicited commercial communications.

You must not use this website for any purposes related to marketing without the express written consent of https://harinarmadi.id.

Restricted access

Access to certain areas of this website is restricted. https://harinarmadi.id reserves the right to restrict access to certain areas of this website, or at our discretion, this entire website. https://harinarmadi.id may change or modify this policy without notice.

If https://harinarmadi.id provides you with a user ID and password to enable you to access restricted areas of this website or other content or services, you must ensure that the user ID and password are kept confidential. You alone are responsible for your password and user ID security..

https://harinarmadi.id may disable your user ID and password at https://harinarmadi.id's sole discretion without notice or explanation.

User content

In these terms and conditions, “your user content” means material (including without limitation text, images, audio material, video material and audio-visual material) that you submit to this website, for whatever purpose.

You grant to https://harinarmadi.id a worldwide, irrevocable, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute your user content in any existing or future media. You also grant to https://harinarmadi.id the right to sub-license these rights, and the right to bring an action for infringement of these rights.

Your user content must not be illegal or unlawful, must not infringe any third party's legal rights, and must not be capable of giving rise to legal action whether against you or https://harinarmadi.id or a third party (in each case under any applicable law).

You must not submit any user content to the website that is or has ever been the subject of any threatened or actual legal proceedings or other similar complaint.

https://harinarmadi.id reserves the right to edit or remove any material submitted to this website, or stored on the servers of https://harinarmadi.id, or hosted or published upon this website.

https://harinarmadi.id's rights under these terms and conditions in relation to user content, https://harinarmadi.id does not undertake to monitor the submission of such content to, or the publication of such content on, this website.

No warranties

This website is provided “as is” without any representations or warranties, express or implied. https://harinarmadi.id makes no representations or warranties in relation to this website or the information and materials provided on this website.

Without prejudice to the generality of the foregoing paragraph, https://harinarmadi.id does not warrant that:

Nothing on this website constitutes, or is meant to constitute, advice of any kind. If you require advice in relation to any legal, financial or medical matter you should consult an appropriate professional.

Limitations of liability

https://harinarmadi.id will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contact, the law of torts or otherwise) in relation to the contents of, or use of, or otherwise in connection with, this website:

These limitations of liability apply even if https://harinarmadi.id has been expressly advised of the potential loss. 

Exceptions

Nothing in this website disclaimer will exclude or limit any warranty implied by law that it would be unlawful to exclude or limit; and nothing in this website disclaimer will exclude or limit the liability of Hari Narmadi in respect of any:

Reasonableness

By using this website, you agree that the exclusions and limitations of liability set out in this website disclaimer are reasonable.

If you do not think they are reasonable, you must not use this website.

Other parties

You accept that, as a limited liability entity, https://harinarmadi.id has an interest in limiting the personal liability of its officers and employees. You agree that you will not bring any claim personally against https://harinarmadi.id's officers or employees in respect of any losses you suffer in connection with the website.

Without prejudice to the foregoing paragraph, you agree that the limitations of warranties and liability set out in this website disclaimer will protect https://harinarmadi.id's officers, employees, agents, subsidiaries, successors, assigns and sub-contractors as well as https://harinarmadi.id.

Unenforceable provisions

If any provision of this website disclaimer is, or is found to be, unenforceable under applicable law, that will not affect the enforceability of the other provisions of this website disclaimer.

Indemnity

You hereby indemnify https://harinarmadi.id and undertake to keep https://harinarmadi.id indemnified against any losses, damages, costs, liabilities and expenses (including without limitation legal expenses and any amounts paid by https://harinarmadi.id to a third party in settlement of a claim or dispute on the advice of https://harinarmadi.id's legal advisers) incurred or suffered by https://harinarmadi.id arising out of any breach by you of any provision of these terms and conditions, or arising out of any claim that you have breached any provision of these terms and conditions.

Breaches of these terms and conditions

Without prejudice to https://harinarmadi.id's other rights under these terms and conditions, if you breach these terms and conditions in any way, https://harinarmadi.id may take such action as https://harinarmadi.id deems appropriate to deal with the breach, including suspending your access to the website, prohibiting you from accessing the website, blocking computers using your IP address from accessing the website, contacting your internet service provider to request that they block your access to the website and/or bringing court proceedings against you.

Variation

https://harinarmadi.id may revise these terms and conditions from time-to-time. Revised terms and conditions will apply to the use of this website from the date of the publication of the revised terms and conditions on this website. Please check this page regularly to ensure you are familiar with the current version.

Assignment

https://harinarmadi.id may transfer, sub-contract or otherwise deal with https://harinarmadi.id's rights and/or obligations under these terms and conditions without notifying you or obtaining your consent.

You may not transfer, sub-contract or otherwise deal with your rights and/or obligations under these terms and conditions.

Severability

If a provision of these terms and conditions is determined by any court or other competent authority to be unlawful and/or unenforceable, the other provisions will continue in effect. If any unlawful and/or unenforceable provision would be lawful or enforceable if part of it were deleted, that part will be deemed to be deleted, and the rest of the provision will continue in effect.

Entire agreement

These terms and conditions, together with https://harinarmadi.id's Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between you and https://harinarmadi.id in relation to your use of this website, and supersede all previous agreements in respect of your use of this website.

Law and jurisdiction

These terms and conditions will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of NEVADA, USA, and any disputes relating to these terms and conditions will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of NEVADA, USA.

About these website Terms of Service

We created these website terms and conditions using the TOS / T and C generator available from Privacy Policy Online.

https://harinarmadi.id's details

The full name of v is Hari Narmadi.
Privacy Policy Online Approved Site

You can contact https://harinarmadi.id by email at our email address link at the top of this Terms of Service document.

entry.title: Privacy Policy
entry.summary: Privacy Policy for Hari Narmadi At Hari Narmadi, accessible from https://harinarmadi.id, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Hari Narmadi and how we use it.  If…
entry.content:
Privacy Policy for Hari Narmadi

At Hari Narmadi, accessible from https://harinarmadi.id, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Hari Narmadi and how we use it. 

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

Log Files

Hari Narmadi follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Privacy Policy Generator and the Privacy Policy Generator.

Cookies and Web Beacons

Like any other website, Hari Narmadi uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

For more general information on cookies, please read the "What Are Cookies" article on Cookie Consent website.

Google DoubleClick DART Cookie

Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL – https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Our Advertising Partners

Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. For easier access, we hyperlinked to their Privacy Policies below.

  • Google

https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Privacy Policies

You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Hari Narmadi.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Hari Narmadi, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit. 

Note that Hari Narmadi has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

Third Party Privacy Policies

Hari Narmadi's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options. 

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites. What Are Cookies?

Children's Information

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

Hari Narmadi does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records. 

Online Privacy Policy Only

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Hari Narmadi. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

Consent

By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its Terms and Conditions.

entry.content:
